item.title: Introducing PacBot
item.description: Gartner predicts that “through 2020, 95 percent of cloud security failures will be the customer’s fault.” The very nature of public cloud, the ease at which developers can create, modify and delete resources –gives us the agility we love but also makes it easy to overlook security guidelines. The dynamic nature of the cloud further complicates matters, especially if you have a very large footprint. From a recent survey conducted by cybersecurity-insiders.
